press_pass.name: Press Pass
press_pass.description: A laminated badge stamped with foreign press credentials. Flashing it can open doors—or paint a target on your back.

notebook.name: Reporter's Notebook
notebook.description: Pages dog-eared and ink-stained, filled with hurried interviews and half-legible shorthand.

government_id.name: Government ID
government_id.description: An official card bearing the Crown's crest. It grants access but also binds you to bureaucracy.

coded_message.name: Coded Message
coded_message.description: A scrap of paper covered in numbers and phrases only a trained eye can decipher.

fake_id.name: Fake ID
fake_id.description: An expertly forged document, perfect until someone looks too closely.
fake_id.risk: If discovered, increases all faction suspicion significantly

first_aid_kit.name: First Aid Kit
first_aid_kit.description: A small pouch of bandages and antiseptic—life-saving when violence erupts.

old_photograph.name: Family Photograph
old_photograph.description: A creased snapshot of smiling faces, a reminder of what peace once looked like.
